title: Whop Clipper
job_overview:
I’m looking to hire a dedicated Whop clipper to help me generate income through viral content submissions using the Whop platform.

You’ll be responsible for:
 • Finding and joining Whop bounty groups
 • Using the Wop platform (or other AI tools like Quso, Opus Clip, etc.) to clip viral content from long-form videos
 • Submitting clips to Whop bounties or rewards groups for monetization
 • Delivering the clips to me in folders (Google Drive or Dropbox)
 • Tracking views, accepted clips, and payments received

This is a performance-focused content role with a flat monthly pay. I do not need content from my brand — your job is to clip trending videos from creators and podcasts, as instructed in Whop bounties.
